errors.resource_exists: A {{ resource }} with that name already exists
errors.resource_not_found: The {{ resource }} you are looking for could not be found

ping.name: ping
ping.description: Gets the latency of the bot

config.name: config

admin-role.name: admin-role

add.name: add
add.description: Add a role to the admin role list.

role.name: role
role.description: The role to add to the admin role list.

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Remove a role from the admin role list.

role.name: role
role.description: The role to remove from the admin role list.

list.name: list
list.description: List all roles in the admin role list.

admin-role.success_add: Successfully added <@&{{role}}> as a administrator role.
admin-role.failure_add_already_in_list: Failed to add <@&{{role}}> as a administrator role. It is already in the list.
admin-role.failure_add_already_in_other_list: Failed to add <@&{{role}}> as a administrator role. It is already in the moderator role list.
admin-role.role_list: The following roles are administrator roles:
admin-role.success_remove: Successfully removed <@&{{role}}> as an administrator role.
admin-role.failure_remove_not_in_list: Failed to remove <@&{{role}}> as an administrator role. It is not in the list.

mod-role.name: mod-role

add.name: add
add.description: Add a role to the mod role list.

role.name: role
role.description: The role to add to the mod role list.

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Remove a role from the mod role list.

role.name: role
role.description: The role to remove from the mod role list.

list.name: list
list.description: List all roles in the mod role list.

mod-role.success_add: Successfully added <@&{{role}}> as a moderator role.
mod-role.failure_add_already_in_list: Failed to add <@&{{role}}> as a moderator role. It is already in the list.
mod-role.failure_add_already_in_other_list: Failed to add <@&{{role}}> as a moderator role. It is already in the administrator role list.
mod-role.role_list: The following roles are moderator roles:
mod-role.success_remove: Successfully removed <@&{{role}}> as a moderator role.
mod-role.failure_remove_not_in_list: Failed to remove <@&{{role}}> as a moderator role. It is not in the list.

config.no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command. You need to have the ``ADMINISTRATOR`` permission or have a role in the admin role list.

logs.name: logs
logs.description: Base command for configuring your server logs

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to create the log channel in

home.description: Please select where in <#{{ channel }}> do you want to create the log messages.
home.button-thread: In a thread in this channel

rainbow.name: rainbow
rainbow.description: Change the color of the role rainbow.
rainbow.norole: You must have the role <@&{{role}}> to use this command.
rainbow.failure: The command failed. The role has now lost its color.
rainbow.cooldown: The command is on cooldown. You can use it again in {{time}}.
rainbow.changed: The role <@&{{role}}> has been changed from **{{oldColor}}** to **{{newColor}}**
